data.actual_result: Unable to open the link until Chrome is installed or the setting changed.
data.expected_result: Discord would default to in-app browser or Safari to open the link
data.short_description: Unable to click on links if selected browser is uninstalled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Install or Have Chrome installed - Have Chrome selected as the web browser in discord settings - Uninstall Chrome - Verify Chrome is still in discord settings - Click on a link in a channel
